attributes.action: Stop the 10pm curfew to save hospitality industry
attributes.additional_details: Closing pubs, bars, restaurants will not help or affect Covid 19. The correct measurements were in place and even tho it was hard, people were still following it. Why supermarkets are still open ? Why gyms are still open ? Why public transport is still active ? We want Government to understand and Parliament to be voice of us for this situation.
attributes.background: Us, hospitality business owners and workers will completely be destroyed in a few months if 10pm curfew doesn’t get stopped with immediate affect.
